features: 【Universal Pads】Hibaby regular replacement microfiber mop pads. 3 Pack pads size: 13.0 × 4.9 inches, compatible with joymop, ooshang various mop brands regular flat mops. Recommend replacing refills every 1-2 months up to use frequency

【Great Absorption】High quality microfiber mop pads. Which are effective on picking up dirt and absorbing water than cotton or disposable spray mop refills. Experience exceptional liquid absorption, our microfiber mop pad suitable for wet dry uses mop

【Easy Cleaning】Our mop pads tackle dirt, dust, and grime with ease. The ultra-fine fibers create a superior cleaning surface that captures particles effectively, leaving your floors spotless in no time. It's easier and much more efficient to use HiBaby's flat mop with it's specified HiBaby's buckets together

【Reusable and Washable】Crafted from high-quality microfiber, Mop pads washable microfiber withstands multiple washes without losing its effectiveness. This reusability not only saves you money in the long run but also contributes to a more sustainable cleaning routine

【Excellent Customer Service】We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service. If you encounter any issues with our product, please contact us, and we will do everything we can to resolve the problem

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #35,100 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #93 in Household Replacement Mop Pads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this system!
reviews.reviewText: I love the mop and bucket these go with and extra pads are handy. They fit well. They hold up in the washer very well. I have a German shepherd and a pittie. Foot prints are muddy and many I mop daily and with extra pads I can wash when I have a load of towels. I would recommend this system and would purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These microfiber mop pads have fairly thick fiber. They are very absorbent. They work well on my hardwood, ceramic, and linoleum floors. The white mop pad has some firmer fibers in the pad providing some extra cleaning power, but still does not remove scuff marks in the linoleum. Still nice reusable pads for general floor cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely a superior mop pad.
reviews.reviewText: I have no doubt that this is a superior mop pad. I say that having tried dozens of different pads over the past years. For the most part, those are all the same.When it comes to the short-nap (short fiber) mop pads nothing I've seen comes close to these. They're thicker, and tighter. There's simply more fibers in these, and that makes for more surface area, and more liquid pickup & retention.These are not floppy like all the others, either. They're rather rigid, and that's because the backing is better, as well. They even look different with grey & white striping on one set, and the third being a sort of grey & white marbled design. Very unique for a truly unique (and high quality) mop pad.These don't seem to cost any more, either. They're priced essentially the same as the others, and in fact, they're less expensive than some that are just inferior.They are very well bound, and this is the only brand to provide support on the outside edges on the bottom, where the pads have a tendency to curl up.Works like a charm, cleans easily. Toss 'em in the washing machine, and they come out like new.Fantastic product, and clearly way better than the competition. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love the color
reviews.reviewText: I have a few of these that are ugly and super duper bright. I love these nice neutral colors. The quality is quite good. It's very dense and doesn't feel cheap at all even though they're really affordable. They're rewashable so I feel better than using disposals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice generic mop head pad in a great color
reviews.reviewText: I was initially drawn to this set of mop head pads because of the color. I’m tired of all the bright reds, greens and blues I keep seeing out there. I’m very visual and I work hard on not having those colors in my home. (Rubbermaid are you listening?) Gray is perfect for me!The quality is good and the stitching professional. They attach to my mop very nicely. Be sure to measure your mop head. It doesn’t have to be a perfect match but the Velcro on your mop head needs to at least be covered by the pad to stay attached.I think the value is good and these should survive a wash or two to be reusable.I would order these again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice mop pads
reviews.reviewText: With my previous wet mop handle, it works perfectly! Excellent alternative mop head! was relieved to find that the refills are so affordable. I simply give the pads a quick wash in hot water, wring them out in a pail, and hang them out to dry. Even though I don't think I need to, it's nice to know that I can machine wash, if required. I now have extras to switch out as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and functional
reviews.reviewText: I find these pretty absorbent, if a bit on the thin side. These did not come in a vacuum sealed bag like some I've received, so I did not have to pre-soak them. They are a generic size but you still need to measure if you use the end tabs on the mop head. The measurements on the listing are accurate. I see these lasting several months at least.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flat Mop Pads, 3 Pack 13" X 4.9" Flat Mop Microfiber. White and Grey. Reusable.
reviews.reviewText: The HiBaby brand's "Flat Mop Pads" are a reusable three-pack of flat mop heads.They perform well and can be reused many times. When laundering or hand washing (which is what I recommend for longest life and to avoid transferring floor dirt to your washer), don't use any fabric softener so as to maintain absorbency.Pros:Universal compatibility: Fits various flat mop brands, potentially saving you money on buying brand-specific refills.High absorbency: Microfiber material tackles dirt and absorbs water effectively, making wet and dry cleaning a breeze.Reusable and washable: Saves money and reduces waste compared to disposable mop pads.Easy cleaning: The ultra-fine fibers capture dirt and grime efficiently, leaving floors spotless with minimal effort.Cons:Pricey compared to alternatives: Disposable mop pads can be cheaper, and other reusable options might offer similar performance at a lower cost.Brand reputation unknown: HiBaby is a relatively new brand, so its track record for quality and customer service is yet to be established.Keep in mind that using and laundering microfiber products releases microplastic particles.
